description: This task-based guide is the perfect tool for those just starting with Joomla. It shows how to create, customize, and maintain a dynamic Joomla 1.6 website starting with fundamental concepts, and then going through essential features. You'll learn not only the functions of Joomla such as adding content and structure, creating categories and menus, and using the media manager, modules, and templates-but also how each function works with the whole.This video training was created by James Westley Foreman based on the Joomla! Visual QuickStart Guide.
title: Joomla!: Video QuickStart
